column2: Jumia Technologies AG engages in the provision of logistic services. The company is headquartered in Berlin, Berlin and currently employs 5,128 full-time employees. The firm operates an online marketplace for African consumers to buy and sell goods. The firm offers a number of products, which includes dresses, leggings, skirts, polo shirts, belts, watches, sunglasses, health products, beauty products and a range of products for children, among others.
